title: OK place for a business meetiing
text:
Stayed there for 3 nights for a business meeting in the hotel. The pick up and drop were well done, co-ordinated and efficient. The rooms were OK for the location, would be good for business travel. The conference halls we got were congested, not spacey and the ambiance OK. Lots of companies seem to be doing the residential training there, so tends to get too crowded. Checked with them about the gym, they said, under renovation, so you need to go out for a walk  if you want to really work out. They have a bar, next door, a restaurant, all OK  for business. Would not be ideal for a family stay or for peace and quiet.

--Arkz
=====

title: Kohinoor Continental is a true sample of ‘Excellent Hospitality’ with ‘A Top Notch Hotel, I have stayed in Mumbai’.
text:
Kohinoor Continental is a true sample of ‘Excellent Hospitality’ with ‘A Top Notch Hotel, I have stayed in Mumbai’. My stay from June 22-24, 2019 was pleasant. I was so pleased with the meeting location and space and wanted to say thank you. 
The Rooms are Spacious, Clean and Super Comfortable. Friendly Staff, Great Value for Money, Location, Interior, Washroom, Terrace - Everything Furnished with Taste, a Sense of Quality and Comfort. The complementary Breakfast has good menu and it was tasty- Great Cuisine.
Lord Ganapati at the entrance got attracted the most. Impressed by the tiniest of tiny things here.
Though, all the amenities were available like Swimming Pool, Free Wi-Fi, etc. I couldn’t use it to give a comment. Only request is to keep an affordable price, especially to the middle class people- like me; So that, they too can experience the beautiful ambience of Kohinoor Continental.
The staff was very helpful and courteous. Special thanks to Mr. Deepak and Ms. Sonia at the reception. Shortly, will visit again.
ownerResponse/text:

title: Great place!
text: THe hotel was perfecly situated and had nice rooms. The staff very friendly and helpful. Nice to sit on the roofterrace and eat breakfast. No luxury, but clean and neat. We will definately come back if we go to Mumbai again.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Fantastic location, hotel has "character".
text:
Had gone for the Kala Ghoda festival, and this hotel was located right next door. It's in any case located superbly. My third floor room, though small, was decent, with a clean bathroom. Loved the old style lift, which functioned surprisingly efficiently. Service though is a bit slow, and the coffee arrives cold...why no coffee maker in the rooms? It was overall, charming, with the reception on the fifth floor and the rooms below...a reversal! 
One can order food from a variety of restaurants located nearby. Quaint, but not bad. 
THe place is functional, rather than luxurious, and clean. 
The reception was very helpful when I discovered that I had left the charger of my cellphone behind. The girl there realized that her charger would fit my phone, and smilingly charged mine when required! That was a good experience.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Good Budget Hotel
text:
Stayed 5 nightshere during February 2014. Hotel was worth the money paid. Although the rooms on the 1st floor are much nicer. We had the family room on the fifth floor room number 515. This room was very near to the kitchen and so became very noisy very early in the morning. 

The room itself was good with nice 4 beds for a family to sleep. Bathroom was well tiled and clean and hot water was always available. Rooms were cleaned daily and fresh towels replaced everyday. Air conditioning was working to perfection. Nice sized tv and a fridge was available.  The safety deposit box wasnt working in our room and never required it so never complained.

Breakfast was not like wow but was enough to take you through till lunch time.
Location of hotel is good with taxis readily available. Not in a very noisy area of Mumbai. Train station was just a stones throw away if you are one of those who like to travel by train.

Overall it was a good stay. Would Recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a budget hotel.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Perfekte Lage, gute Zimmer
text:
Die Lage in Churchgate ist perfekt: in nur wenigen Metern ist man am Marine Drive und bis nach Colaba braucht man mit dem Taxi nur ein paar Minuten. In der Umgebung gibt es weiter einige Restaurants und Bars.
Das Zimmer war absolut sauber und geräumig, das Personal freundlich und das Frühstück auf der Dachterasse zwar nicht üppig, aber vollkommen okay und mit grandiosem Ausblick.
Für so einen tollen Preis haben wir bisher noch nicht ansatzweise in Mumbai übernachtet, deshalb absolut zu empfehlen.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Very pleasant stay
text: We had 3 nights here in Jan '14, in the delightful rooftop room, which had its own patio area and good views down to the sea and across the city.  The location is excellent, good laundry service, and very helpful staff. A good base for exploring Mumbai. Small charge for wifi, the only time we had to pay for wifi in India, but this may be normal for Mumbai?
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: My Mumbai marathon base
text:
This is the second time i stayed here. I prefer this place when i am going for the mumbai marathon as its close to the starting point. This time we had taken the deluxe room. The room was of decent size and lot better than their regular rooms which can feel very cramped. 

Their service although no frills is excellent. If you want tea at 3 AM, its there for you in 5 mins. Even the front desk gentlemen are very helpful in a informal sort of way. 

The location is the best one could hope for in mumbai unless you can afford to stay at Taj or Oberoi. 
I will never look for another place in Mumbai for my annual marathon trip.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Good place to stay
text: A comfortable base for a few nights in Mumbai. The staff  were friendly and helpful and the room was great - 2 niggles - but they are important ones - wi fi charged at 100 rupees an hour - the only time we could not access free wi fi somewhere in the hotel during the month we spent in India - and no hot water between 10.00am and 6.00pm - so arriving travel weary at 4pm no hot shower.  Having said that we would certainly stay there again.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: bien situé, bon rapport qualité/prix
text: 3 premières nuits dans cet hôtel, arrivée à 7h du matin, très bon accueil, chambre standard mais fonctionnelle; Excellente situation, loin de l'agitation , du bruit et pourtant accessible à tout....seul bémol, petit déjeuner un peu léger et long.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Best staff in India so far!
text:
Had an excellent stay for 1 night in this hotel.
The rooms were clean and tidy, the staff super helpful and a joy to interact with.

The location was very good, near a lot of sights and food places. I have nothing bad to say about this place at all.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: A good experience
text: I stayed here for close to two weeks on a trip to Mumbai. The hotel is a walking distance from Marine Drive, which was great for an evening stroll. The road that it is on isn't THAT noisy at night - considering my last stay in Mumbai was near Causeway, this was a significant improvement! The hotel staff were always friendly and helpful. The rooms themselves were tidy. Besides a window that broke, (the staff immediately fixed it, which was good) the bathrooms were acceptable and and clean. The breakfast that they offered could have been better as there wasn't much variety, we mostly had an egg, toast, coffee and a banana everyday for two weeks. But overall it was a good experience and will consider returning.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Excellent location and service
text: We stayed at Chateau Windsor for 4 nights at the end of November 2013. This is a good hotel if you are looking for an affordable hotel in a convenient location - the costs were reasonable, and the location was great, right by Churchgate Station and steps away from Marine Drive. The staff were courteous and very attentive, and promptly answered our questions and requests. The room (for 3 adults) had comfortable beds, A/C and was clean and well maintained. We were pleased with our stay and would stay here again, on our next visit to Mumbai.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Super Standort
text:
Die Zimmer sind auf dem neusten Stand(nicht verschnarcht, wie im lonely Planet beschrieben), alle sehr hilfreich und das Frühstück auf dem Dach prima !
Das nächste mal würde ich ins Penthouse ziehen, mitg fast Blick aus das Necklace der Königin.
Bei Problemen mit dem Schuhwerk hilft der kleine Meister seines Fachs auf der Hoteleingangsseite links hervorragend weiter !
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: A pleasant surprise!
text:
When we arrived my heart slightly sank by the rather dated exterior. However, after being shown to our room I was extremely impressed by the size and modern decor. Air con worked perfectly, the shower and bathroom were immaculate and an LCD TV was mounted on the wall. 

In typical Indian style, the bed was rather solid but it was to be expected! 

Overall, a brilliant hotel in a fantastic location.

Highly recommended!
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Ideal Churchgate location
text: Chateau Windsor is a hotel in a multi use building, there are offices and apartments sharing the floors but it does not have any effect on your stay.  I spent a week in November and found the location ideal, it is next to the ambassador hotel and is half the price.  The amenities are limited but the breakfast is adequate and the rooms are clean quiet and spacious. The staff are always attentive and will help with your every need.  I highly recommend this hotel for a South Mumbai stay.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Good location, clean but no free wifi?!
text: This hotel is above average - good, but I wouldn't say very good. It is centrally located, a short drive away from the main area around Leopold's and everything in the room works very well and is very clean. the whole building isn't a hotel - the hotel is a few floors within what seems to be a normal apartment block. This gives it a very different feel - no lobby/ reception area, Restuarant etc. as one walks in. The reception area is on the 4th floor. The reason I don't score it higher is because one pays for wifi by the hour (1 hour coupons sold) and it doesn't have the full look, feel and facilities of a hotel.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Excellent Hotel
text: I stayed in this Hotel for 3 nights and four Days in Oct 2012. The entrance was pretty deceptive but when we saw the rooms we were atually in awe. The location could not have been more perfect. 200m from Marine drive was all we could walk towards. The bathroom was also fantastic. There was no restaurant at this hotel at that time but the Breakfast they provided was excellent and perfectly priced. Moreover what I loved was the Staff, From the lift-man to the managers to the waiters, all were extremely good. I would definitely go back to this hotel if I am on a non business trip. The only minus for not choosing for a business trip would be the distance from Andheri side.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: They have wonderful friendly ever smiling staff
text: I stayed in this hotel with my family for 10 days. We had a comfortable stay. The staff were ever ready to serve us at any time of the day. The deluxe room was very comfortable n clean with lovely breeze.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: A nice and quiet place
text: Extremely good. I found that although it was a stay of only 5 nights, the friendliness and individual attention of the staff increased daily and one felt as a personal friend of the hotel as well as a guest
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Good location and neat place to stay
text: Very good location (spot on Marine Drive), neat rooms with balcony, excellent service, friendly staff, safe place. The hotel provided us with car services to travel along with family at industry standard rates. The breakfast was very helpful. Neighborhood has lot of nice hotels at all prices.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: nice for business travelor
text: location is nice, in some room with less price separate bathrooms are available, rest newly built up rooms are specious, but its a hotel with mixed types of rooms. restaurant is not available but staff is very friendly n they can arrange fooding from nearby variety of restaurants.. located just at marine drive, superb, but can have very little view of sea from the front side room balcony only.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: The best place to stay in South Bombay
text: An excellent hotel whether you are going for business or pleasure. Courteous staff, a very high degree of cleanliness and a location that can't be beat. Being staying for years and it just keeps getting better.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Chateau Windsor - clean, safe and very friendly!
text: We booked over hostels.com and got a really big, quiet and clean room (room 510). The prices are high in mumbai, compared to the rest of india, but it was really worth to go there. It's very close to cinema, marine drive and churchgate station, and you can easily walk to colaba. The staff is very helpful, they even opened a room in the evening so that we could shower there (our flight home was after midnight). We had a simple but good breakfast at the rooftop. Thank you very much! We will come again.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Bringing the retro back!
text: We stayed here during one of our reunion trips and the experience was really good. The hotel is situated barely 10 seconds walking time away from marine drive. It's an old school hotel, which makes a statement about what Mumbai was and how the heritage is still intact. Rooms were good, the staff friendly and the breakfast was decent.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Stay in heart of mumbai
text: Two nights aug 21 and 22 ,2013 on a business trip stayed in chateau Windsor in church gate.hotel is next to ambassador .renovated rooms are excellent.nariman point is close by.morning walk in marine drive just 50 mtrs from hotel.pizza to dosa restaurents in close walking distance.church gate station is 100 mtrs.satkar veg restaurents opp to church gate station offers south and North Indian delicacies at a competitive price.brij basi sweets baskin robin ice cream next door.what more required go ahead and stay in chateau Windsor ,churchgate mumbai.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Bellissimo hotel vicino alla corte suprema e al gateway of India
text:
Hotel molto bello e con stanze spaziose, situato vicino ai migliori punti turistici della cittá. Il servizio è ottimo e veloce ed il personale è molto cortese e disponibile! Si può usufruire di wireless a pagamento nelle camere, servizio di lavanderia, aria condizionata, tv e colazione in camera. Se non si ha voglia di uscire per la cena, è possibile ordinare da dei ristoranti di fiducia dell'hotel direttamente in camera propria. 
Lo consiglio caldamente a chiunque voglia prendersi qualche giorno di relax e comfort in a grande città come Mumbai!!
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Accogliente
text: Questo hotel curiosamente si presenta peggiore di ciò che in effetti è. L'ascensore "manuale" con uscere incluso e la reception che ha più ventilatori che metri quadri vi faranno subito pensar male, ma sistemati nella vostra stanza vi troverete bene. Ovvio, non aspettatevi nulla di speciale se non lo stretto stretto necessario, ma il tutto nella generale idea di un'ordine e pulizia rigorosi. La zona è ottima, anche se Mumbai è sconfinata; unica vera pecca, come d'altra parte in molti altri hotel, il wi-fi a pagamento. Per quello che costa e per quello che costa Mumbai, hotel consigliato.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Neem GEEN superior room!
text:
Uiteindelijk hebben we aan dit hotel een goede ervaring overgehouden, maar het begin was niet goed. Terwijl we een Deluxe kamer hadden geboekt, werden we (onwetend) in een 'superior room' geplaatst. Deze kamer had meer weg van een slagers hok, met tegels als muurdecoratie in plaats van behang of verf. Totaal sfeerloos en niet aan te raden voor het bedrag wat je betaalt. 

Toch maar even de receptie gevraagd of ze dit een Deluxe room vonden, toen bleek dat ze onze boeking (via hotels.com) hadden aangezien als een superior room. Eerst vonden ze dat ik zelf maar contact op moest nemen met hotel.com (ook al liet ik de emailbevestiging zien waarop duidelijk 'Deluxe room' stond), maar nadat ik hier geen genoegen mee nam en bleef staan ging de receptioniste toch maar even bellen.

Uiteindelijk bleek dat ze verkeerd gekeken had en liet ze me twee Deluxe rooms zien. Dat was echt een wereld van verschil met de superior room (superieur waaraan die kamer was wisten ze zelf ook niet) en opgelucht haalde ik en m'n vriendin adem. Voor het geld wat we hadden betaald (70 EUR per nacht) was de Deluxe room ook wat we vooraf hadden verwacht. 

De superior room kost maar 7-8 EUR per nacht minder, maar dat geld was het meer dan waard.

De service was verder prima en we mochten op de dag van vertrek, bij het ophalen van de bagage die daar opgeslagen lag, zelfs even een kamer gebruiken om ons om op te frissen (het had erg geregend).
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: An enjoyable 4 night stay at this wonderful little hotel
text: This hotel is a minute walk from Marine Drive which is a promenade walk sweeping around the west coast of Mumbai.  Very central to the touristy attractions and easy to get to the many markets in this area, taxi's are cheap to use and most have meters.  The hotel is clean and the staff are friendly and helpful.  We were given a room on the rooftop, in good weather it would be lovely (it was monsoon!). The room was clean and attractive with a lovely shower.  Breakfast was served in the room every morning as there is no dining room.  Breakfast was simple, but good, toast, eggs and banana with tea or coffee.  I would recommend this hotel as it is  reasonably priced too.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Great location and very comfortable stay
text: I stayed at Chateau Windsor Hotel during my last 3 visits to India over the past 5 years. I often reminisce about the lovely mornings I spent on the terrace; reading the newspaper (that gets delivered every morning to each room) while sipping on  some tea or coffee. The few items that the breakfast menu has to offer is enough to provide good sustenance for most of the day.  The hotel staff (from the front desk to kitchen to cleaning) are very friendly and helpful.  The hotel is immaculately clean. If you’re feeling lazy, the hotel also places food orders from neighbouring restaurants on your behalf, has them collected, plated and delivered to your room! The hotel’s vicinity is great, with a supermarket, several restaurants, beauty parlours, clothing stores, departmental stores, railway station, etc. just a stone’s throw away. Down the road, the Marine Drive promenade is perfect for strolling, exercising or simply admiring nature’s beauty at any time of the day. I look forward to staying at this hotel during my future visits to Mumbai.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Surprisingly nice
text:
We booked here because of the location, and the price (we needed three rooms to accommodate our large family).  I was not expecting much as we had seen CW not just on Trip Advisor but Hostel World so I expected spartan or marginal rooms, given the very reasonable (for Mumbai) rates.

I was so pleasantly surprised to see what a nice hotel it was.  There is no lobby per se, and very little in the way of amenities.  However the rooms were very, very clean (you can request daily cleaning), staff more than accommodating (we did tip them as they came and went as I don't think perhaps management distributes the tips from the central "tip box") and the Churchgate location is fantastic.  Staff at front door entrance will answer any questions you have (all speak some English), direct you, advise you of going tariffs for taxis, etc.  Safe and secure,,,and if you can upgrade to best rooms available they are almost luxury quality for a really budget price.  Only peeve we had was housekeeping phones (loud!) that rang often in hallway, but never at night.  Lovely find!
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Good location and value for money
text: The location of the hotel is very good. Walkable distance from Marine drive promenade. One  can enjoy a nice idyllic walk in the evening. Housekeeping is very good. Rooms are clean and well furnished. The lack of in-house dining/restaurant options is made up with plenty of takeaway options that can be ordered via the room service from the nearby hotels, or better walk down to them (within 5-10 min walkable distances).We stayed in the deluxe room, found it comfortable and would recommend this hotel for no frills stay at mumbai !  It is better to mention the landmark as "besides Ambassador Hotel, Churchgate" to the taxi drivers.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: One my wonderful stays!!
text: By words I cannot describe, how peaceful and happy I felt choosing this hotel. This hotel is sitting right on the edge of the Churchgate and walkable to Marine drive.  Took a good run in the Marine drive with the Mumbaikars!  Though the hotel does not have restaurant, you don't miss much as there tons across the road, just walk out of hotel, you will find varieties till the churchgate station.  Walk down the Churchgate station, you will find moderate veg restaurants satisfying your tongues...My unstoppable appreciations to the owner of this hotel for all the personal attention during my stay.  Your breakfast is limited to Bread, butter, eggs and coffee with a or two banana.  But enjoy them as they are healthy and served at the room will be comfortable. Don't miss a stay here!!
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: great location
text: really great location within walking distance for both Gateway to India and Crawford market and Bazaars in the other direction. staff very helpful. room clean. Breakfast the usual standard eggs toast  tea/coffee and a banana. You can have breakfast either in your room or on roof terrace . No restaurant but can order take away from nearby restaurants   or easily at out. Very short walk to promenade to watch evening outings of the locals and tourists and nice stroll down to Nariman point. 500 rupee for taxi to airport.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: EXCELLENT
text:
Comme à chacun de mes séjours en Inde je réserve trés facilement sur son site Internet ma chambre dans cet hotel.
Les chambres Standart sont sans luxe ostensible mais néammoins comfortables(penderie,coffre-fort, TV avec de nombreuses chaines dont TV 5 & RFI).
Le petit déjeuner est servi en chambre trés tot le matin selon vos souhaits.
De nombreux commerces et divers services sont à proximité ainsi que la promenade sur Marina Drive.
L'hotel est trés calme et le personnel de la Réception au service de chambre est efficace et attentionné.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Great value, great location
text: Tell the taxi driver at the airport that the hotel is next to the Ambassador Hotel, Churchgate, or one block from the Churchgate station.  Good basic accommodation at a fair price.  Lovely view of Back Bay on rooftop terrace during breakfast.  Staff were unfailing gracious, allowed me to use room until I left for airport at 3 pm without extra charge.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Go for it.....
text: Very practical and a great location hotel. If you are looking for a short trip in south Mumbai, this is the place to be. Choose a deluxe room and you will be comfortable. Rooms are spacious and management is professional. Very well maintained, quality staff and wide range of food available on call from nearby restaurants.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Value for money, for its location.
text:
Firstly, South Mumbai is not the cheapest of places. Therefore paying for a hotel room around $75 to $100 is very reasonable. Having extensively researched hotels in South Bombay this is best place for under $100. 
However if Staying in South Bombay is not a priority, then you can certainly get a lot better place for your money in the suburban areas ( If you book early enough you can stay at the Sofitel in Bandra for under $125 ).
Also please make sure not to catch taxi's recommended by the hotel staff since the their prices are rigged.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Simple but just right!
text: We came to Mumbai for a shopping holiday as well as a wedding. When we arrived at Chateau Windsor I was shocked at the simplicity (as my mum had booked it) However, it was perfectly clean, the staff were sweet and friendly, we would order tea to the room and it would arrive quite promptly. The decor is dated, but for £40/50ish a night I cant really complain - especially as it was for 3 of us sharing a room! It isn't somewhere you would want to spend much time in as there's not much to do and its quite shabby but it was perfect for our trip and our intentions for being in Mumbai!
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: Overpriced but comfortable enough
text:
Having heard that mumbai was very expensive for decent accommodation we ensured that we budgetted enough to be certain of a bedbug free and comfortable hotel. Whilst this hotel met both of these requirements it still came up short given that we paid over £50 per night for our stay.

Our room, on the roof, appeared to be an after thought and felt fairly 'hut like'. The decor was tired, the bathroom miniature and towels ratty. Particularly annoying was the air con, which rattled like an old fashioned bus and kept us awake.  After time spent in thailand, cambodian and vietnam this really felt substandard and we feel that the trip adviser reviews to date (which informed our decision to book) misrepresent the value on offer. 

The front of house staff manning the desk were also disappointing. At no point did we feel welcome at the hotel and we also felt that our requests for help (such as whether we could book trains at churchgate) were incovenient to the hotel as we were effectively waved away. 

The porters were far nicer and managed to smile, though we did at times feel uncomfortable when they loitered for tips. In a budget hotel when the services are standard i don't feel that it is appropriate to tip on every occasion.

The breakfast was standard and, if not included in the room, is a bargain at 60 rupees. Other drinks were similarly good value.  The Roof terrace was also pleasant.

Overall we feel a bit ripped off by the hotel (especially the 1350 rupee pick up!!). Im not sure of the general standard in mumbai but for £50 a night id expect at least friendlier service.
placeInfo/address: 86 Veer Nariman Road, Mumbai 400020 India

title: The Associates Make The Difference!
text:
A fabulous stay with utmost warmth and hospitality exhibited by the team at the hotel. I always look forward to returning to this hotel.

I checked in late night and was extremely tired after a long day. I was greeted by a familiar face Kajmeer at the reception who was extremely polite & warm. Anticipating my arrival he ensurred all the required check-in formalities very kept ready before I reached , thus minimising my time spent at the reception.

Check-In was swift!

On departure I was met by Pawan who is ever so warm and accomodating. It's always a pleasure to have long, meaningful conversations with him on varied topics. His client handling / soft skills is something to commend. As a guest you can see that skill being taught / passed on to other members in the team.

Gaurav in the lobby restaurant was a gem to interact with. He suggested the right dishes to kick-start my day.

The hotel feels premium in the lobby , however looses it's charm once you go upstairs. The rooms are run down / outdated and are in need of renovation.

The associates/team working here is what distinguishes this hotel from others. 

Looking forward to returning soon in the near future.

title: Sunday Brunch
text:
Been To This Place For Sunday Brunch. The Spread Was Pretty Huge With Live Music, Pool, Activities And Massage Services. The Spread Had Salads, Soups And Starters Like Tandoori Paneer, Potato Cheese Bhajiya, Kebab. For Main Course They Had North Indian Cuisine, Italian. They Even Had Uppam With Waffles - Both Veg And Non Veg Waffle Cravy Were Available. For Fast Food They Had Pav Bhaji, Chaat Counter And Kheema Pav. Last But Not The Least - Dessert Counter : They Had An Amazing Spread Of Desserts Like Cupcakes, Donuts, Cakes, Gulab Jamun, Lava Cake, Icecreams, Chocolates, Fruits, Chocolate Croissant And Much More.
Everything Was Good Both Veg And Nonveg.
The Timing For Brunch Is 12 - 4 Pm Including Activites, Massage And Swimming Pool. Staff Was Really Polite And Helpful. The Services They Provides Was Upto The Mark. So Basically This Was The Perfect Brunch One Can Experience For. I Personally Had A Great Experience!
Would Love To Visit Again.
Without Swimming Pool - INR900 + Tax
With Swimming Pool - INR1050 + Tax
(Rates May Change So You Need To Concern With The Restaurant)
ownerResponse/connectionToSubject: Mukund Kamat, Vice President – Hotels Division

title: Definitely not four star
text: Booked a room from the 23rd of April until the 24th of April. It was supposed to be a superior room. The staff was friendly, and quite professional. The room and the bathroom looked very dated and looked okay, but far from a four star hotel room. I have stayed in different five and four star hotels, and can without any doubt say that this room did not meet the standards of a four star hotel. Close to the airport, but the charge that the hotel charges you to get to the airport (2.2km) is about 600 INR without tax which is outrageous. It is more than 250 Rs per km after you consider the airport charge. Unbelievable. Just take an Uber or Uber XL which we did in the end.  I would never stay here again for the price I paid.

title: A Pleasant Stay
text:
Excellent service for an airport hotel! Try the buffet dining, you won’t be disappointed! One comment: why not include free tea and coffee in your buffet package? 
At the time this review is written, we’re sitting at the lobby because our flight is still 5 hours away. Mr Shoeb Kalyankar is kindly giving us water bottles and he is also arranging our transfer to airport. When we arrived in Mumbai, Mr Shoeb also greeted us at the Airport and arranged a pick up to the hotel. Thank you for the hospitality Mr Shoeb! One comment: maybe update the shuttle bus, it looks a little bit dated.
All in all, a great practical modern hotel, and we had a pleasant stay. Thank you!

title: Always a favourite!
text:
I have stayed here many times over the last couple of years and I really enjoy the hotel. The staff are super friendly, rooms are a good size and nice bathroom amenities, plus complimentary newspaper every morning, which you don't get everywhere these days. 

I like the Beryl Bar, quite chilled to have a drinks at and breakfast is always pretty good. Location is super handy for the metro and walking distance to a few places. They also make a really nice chai in the Lobby Lounge!

title: Enchanting experience🙌
text: We had an amazing stay at Hotel Kohinoor Continental. Wonderful interiors, very good service and some excellent dining too, must recommend the hotel's restaurant for the blini and some exquisite salmon dishes. Very reasonably priced too for a luxury hotel. There was no need to qualm for the restaurant getting closed a little too early each evening.

title: Good and convenient Hotel
text: Stayed at this hotel between 02 April to 05 April 2019. The Hotel is very well located just under the Metro Station with plenty of taxi and auto rickshaws around to commute. The hotel is very clean and nice. This was my 4-5th visit to this hotel. The rooms are quite large with all toileteries and tea coffee and a mini fridge as well. The room service was good. Ordered dinner in the room and the food was very tasty. The buffet breakfast spread was big and tasty with North and South Indian and Continental cuisines. The reception and the coincierge had smiles. Will stay here again on my next visit to Mumbai
ownerResponse/text:

title: Beautiful place unfriendly people
text: It's a real good place with quit good ambience, but the attitude of the staff right from the reception was unbelievable. Not seen such unfriendly people in hospitality in Mumbai. Was also shocked when we ordered a club sandwich in room and the person was like pay cash right now. Guest is gonna stay and they were like pay now for food. So rude. I felt embarrassed why did I recommended this hotel to my frnd.
